comments.content:
Hello,

Thanks I found it myself  
it is

Thanks.  
Hash
Drop this Wrexham Script. It's an illegal copy of Fritz Stelzer's [Script MT](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061405/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/script-mt). Better go with the original...

This is actually Monotype Script, available at the source given by Ryuk. It's a German Script designed by F. H. Steltzer, 1931 based on Pragefest, aka Samson Script, designed by E.Lautenbach, Ludwig & Mayer , 1928. Resembling British Script and Signal.  
Lighter weight version was Monoscript 351.  
Prägefest  
Ludwig & Mayer, Frankfurt am Main  
Erstguß 1926  
Eduard Lautenbach  
Previous thread: [http://www.typophile.com/node/41141](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061405/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41141 "http://www.typophile.com/node/41141")  
Don
